dataTypeRef.title: Data Type References
dataTypeRef.description: This section provides a complete reference for all data types, enumerations, and validation rules used across OpenCMS APIs.

developerWorkflow.title: Developer Workflow
developerWorkflow.description: Integrate with OpenCMS API for card lifecycle management, authentication, inquiries, limits, and preferences.

response.title: Response Codes & Error Handling
response.description: This section defines the standardized HTTP response codes, OpenCMS custom response codes, and error structures returned by the APIs.

users.title: ðŸ§­ Developer Workflow
users.description: This guide explains how a developer can integrate with the OpenCMS API, from obtaining authentication to performing operational requests such as card activation, inquiry, limits, status updates, and channel preference management.
